string.text: I would like to buy something.
Sorry, I do not have that much money.
How did you end up in the Mercenaries?
How did you end up in the Mercenaries?text>

Well as you see it turned out. I was going to Radar and I managed to negotiate with one squad of mercenaries about a joint sally, since I was a well-known and experienced person, they went to the contact. As it turned out to be mercenaries attacked Dolgovtsy and I was asked to help, I agreed. We joined the detachment of Tirana and acted together.
Was the Scarecrow with you, too?
Yes. Together we helped the Tiran detachment to raid the Dolgovites, who were gathering at the Base of Mercenaries. After that, they joined the Syndicate.
